Recommended Distance Learning Daily Academic Schedule for Students

div.p:
Dear InspireNOLA parents and guardians,
As per the Govern John Bel Edwards declaration last week, all Louisiana public schools, including InspireNOLA schools, will remain closed throughout the end of the school year. The shelter-in-place order for New Orleans was extended until May 16 last week as well.
During this time, we at InspireNOLA Charter Schools will continue our mission to educate the youth of this city.
Beginning today, Monday, April 20, InspireNOLA will be offering virtual instruction on Google Meet for grades 3 through 12. Students can virtually attend classes live or watch a recording of the class at a later time.
You can access Google Meet through your child’s Google Classroom. If you need assistance accessing Google Classroom/Google Meet, please watch this video. Virtual class schedules and Google Classroom Codes can be found on your school’s website.
If you have any questions regarding student assignments, please contact your school leader. If you are experiencing technical difficulties, please contact the IT Coordinator for your campus listed below:
42 Charter School: andrew.burras@inspirenolaschools.org
Alice Harte Charter: Notsha.albert@inspirenolaschools.org
Edna Karr High School: nathaniel.albert@inspirenolaschools.org
Eisenhower Charter: Yazid.rabahi@inspirenolaschools.org
McDonogh 35 Senior High: nathan.albert@inspirenolaschools.org
McMain Secondary School: Dionne.robinson@inspirenolaschools.org
Wilson Charter School: jelissa.greenwood@inspirenolaschools.org

br.br:
In conjunction with the remote learning necessitated by the coronavirus (COVID-19), InspireNOLA Charter Schools is offering to students an opportunity to interact with teachers via video chat, including using the Google Classroom and Google Meetings platforms. This is offered to each student, but is not mandatory at this time. We will collect certain information about each student who utilizes the service, including but not limited to the student’s name.
We make no guarantees or promises as to the availability, quality, or security of the video conferencing service or the content delivered.
We may, at our sole discretion, choose to record some or all such video conferences. By allowing your student(s) to utilize the video conferencing service, you perpetually and irrevocably grant to InspireNOLA the absolute right, permission, and license to record the student’s likeness and/or voice, as well as the rights to use, reproduce, display, and/or distribute, and/or to make derivative works from any of them for educational purposes. Again, this is voluntary, and no student is required to utilize the service.
Please contact Emily Hartnett (Emily.Hartnett@inspirenolaschools.org or 504-322-8212) should you have any questions
CEO INFORMATION MEETINGS FOR PARENTS
In these changing times, we want to do all we can to make sure we keep you and your student up-to-date with all the information and resources available, and, most importantly, give you and your students an opportunity to have your questions answered. I will be holding Information Meetings for all InspireNOLA parents preK-11 on Wednesday via the free online meeting system, Zoom. You are invited to attend the session that best fits your schedule.
Meeting for seniors and their parents will be held on Tuesday. Details can be found in today’s senior update email.
To join the call, click the appropriate link below or call (312) 626-6799 and enter your specific meeting's ID and password. You may participate via audio or video, though video is not required. If you have any problems, please view How to Join a Zoom Meeting.
Parent Information Meetings on Wednesday, April 22, 2020:
9 a.m.
https://zoom.us/j/95521686290?pwd=UUIxRzlNWitPbXVsbnBOelJmdndnUT09
Meeting ID: 955 2168 6290
Password: 229556
10 a.m. (in Spanish)
https://zoom.us/j/99832171532?pwd=TTZqM2Z6cnVkVW5aVkRVeXJ2cENnUT09
Meeting ID: 998 3217 1532
Password: 106298
4 p.m.
https://zoom.us/j/98338585309?pwd=c0Z0aXJIQWZXS1B4MTRtQm50aDhEdz09
Meeting ID: 983 3858 5309
Password: 529144

LYFT has donated $5,000 in free rides to and from Food Distribution Sites in Orleans Parish. The following code will be valid 9 a.m.-noon Mondays and Wednesdays. Locations for meal pickup throughout the city can be found here: https://nolapublicschools.com/covid19/nutrition.
To enter a promo code in the Lyft app:
Open the Lyft app
Tap the menu icon in the top left corner
Tap ‘Promos’ in the menu that appears
Tap ‘Enter promo code’ to add the code CV19NOLAPS20
Tap ‘Apply’ to finish
We hope everyone stays safe and healthy!
Sincerely,
Jamar McKneely
InspireNOLA CEO

div.div: InspireNOLA Charter Schools operates a network of seven public charter schools in New Orleans, Louisiana. Founded in 2013, InspireNOLA is currently the highest performing open-admission charter management organization in New Orleans and is the only network with one A-graded school and two B-graded schools. InspireNOLA currently serves more than 5,000 students in pre-kindergarten through 12th grade.

div.p: This website is maintained by the InspireNOLA Charter Schools Communications Office. It is the goal of the network that this website is accessible to all users. View our accessibility statement here. The district is not responsible for facts or opinions contained on any linked site. Some links and features on this site require the Adobe Acrobat Reader to view. Visit the Adobe website to download the free Acrobat Reader here.
